alert.note: Alert for Cannon; De Kalb; Smith; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 5:28PM CST until February 16 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Smith County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern De Kalb County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Cannon County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 600 PM CST. * At 528 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Woodbury, or 3 miles west of Auburntown, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smithville, Gordonsville, Hickman, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty and Auburntown. This includes Interstate 40 near mile marker 260. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
